modName: Longlasting Elixirs for enchanting and smithing
summary: now you have more time to enchant and improve your battlegear.
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION
Why on the earth we have to enchant our gear in one minute if we use a powerful elixir ?

This simple mod increases the duration of Enchanter\'s Elixir and Blacksmith\'s Elixir up to 30 minutes, so you can improve your armors and weapons without drinking an insane amount of elixirs.

This mod only increase the duration of the two elixirs, NOT the effectiveness.

INSTALLATION
It\'s only an esp file, download it via NMM or extract into your DATA folder.

NOTES
version 2.0
corrected the name of the esp (uninstall the older one before updating, they have different names), now the two elixirs should be in english.

PERMISSIONS
If you like this mod and you want to upload on another website or you want to use it for other works, you just have to credit me as author, just pm me.

ABOUT ME
I\' m just a gamer that sometimes does some work on the Creation Kit, please understand that I have a very limited knowledge in scripts and other stuffs, so I really like to receive feedback and suggestions.
Just tell me if there are some grammar errors, I\' m not English, i hope that everyone understands.
author: Shadread
